name: Comercio Network
description: EASIEST WAY FOR COMPANIES TO MANAGE BUSINESS DOCUMENTS WITH THE BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY.
description_long: We think that the blockchain technology has a learning curve too high for anyone, so we want to lower the entry barrier by making it an easy to understand API . We are building a simple, elegant, flexible and solid solution based on the best ideas and solution in the space. We have eliminated the complexity so you can work with commercio.network in just a few minutes.
